reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 22

bcl:section.bcl:text: Any transfer to the government of the properties described below are exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: District Lot 5176, Group 1, New Westminster District, Plan EPP19197, PID 028-829-166;
District Lot 5182, Group 1, New Westminster District, Plan EPP19197, PID 028-829-182;
